name: Robo Charge
description:
Balance between acquiring power ups and keeping your health up on this MegaMan-style 16 bit game.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move [UP - Jump]
E - Enter Shop
ENTER - Turn Power Up ON/OFF
X - Shoot
R - Restart from last checkpoint (in case you get stuck)

Power Ups:
Wall Jump
Shoot
Double Jump
Hook (Not ready)
